import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Sidebar.css'; const Sidebar = () => { const [expandedSections, setExpandedSections] = useState({ idealFor: false, occasion: false, work: false, fabric: false, segment: false, suitableFor: false, rawMaterials: false, pattern: false, }); const toggleSection = (section) => { setExpandedSections({ ...expandedSections, [section]: !expandedSections[section], }); }; return (

); }; export default Sidebar;
